# Demo Checklist - Audio (2025-01-05)

- Build with FMOD libs linked (Debug: fmodL_vc.lib / Release: fmod_vc.lib)
- Confirm fmod.dll or fmodL.dll is in output folder
- Start app, play 3D loop source
- Move camera forward/back to show distance attenuation
- Trigger one-shot sound at object position
- Toggle loop on/off
- Adjust volume and pitch, verify audible change
- Confirm no engine core changes were required
